title: PRICE DROP! Half-off August w/ an ASAP Move-In!
posting_body: ['This adorable row-housing is located on West Lake St and Aldrich Ave S!', 'The outstanding location places you steps from the bustle and fun activities of Uptown AND the numerous, delicious restaurants and eateries nearby.', 'Also, MCAD, U of MN and Downtown are all easily accessible!', 'The kitchen is beautiful: gas range stove, dishwasher, plenty of space.', 'The main living space has hardwood floors, tons of windows for natural light, and vaulted ceilings in the kitchen', 'There is a deck outside the lower level bedroom!', '1/2 OFF ONE MONTH WITH QUALIFYING LEASE AND CREDIT!!!', 'Ready for an August 1st move-in', 'Rent WAS $1,650', "NOW it's $1,550!", 'Deposit WAS $1,650', "NOW it's $1,550!", 'Heat, water and trash are all included.', 'Parking is $65/mo', 'Dogs are welcome with some restrictions and fees.', 'Be sure to check out our website for more information.', 'Sorry no other pets and no smoking.', 'To see a list of our rental criteria and to apply, visit our website at <URL>', 'Locally owned and professionally managed by IrvingProperties.', 'Check out the video tour:', '<URL>']
